articlePreviews.title: Healthy Neighborhoods Challenge
articlePreviews.description: Have an idea to make your community a healthier place to live? Need some cash to make it happen? The Healthy Neighborhoods Challenge supports residents taking an active role in creating a culture of health in their neighborhoods.

articlePreviews.title: ioby 2017 Giving Report
articlePreviews.description: 2017 showed us the power of people working together to solve urgent problems, and demonstrating incredible creativity, compassion, and dedication to making their block, city, and region a better place to live.
